name: Lepur
description:
Hardcore platformer, in which you play for the sweet rabbit.
Your main goal is to collect carrots and stars on a level, after which you must bring them to your carrot store. You can develop a huge speed to overcome obstacles and perform complex maneuvers. Dodge enemies and do not get thorny, use magic mushrooms and bubbles for jumping and taking off.
Your collected carrots are an analog of your life, get damage and lose them all, and if there are no carrots then you will die.
Perfectly balanced gameplay and pleasant music, will give you only pleasant memories of the game. And the eyes will rejoice, looking at the beautiful graphics from the artist Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)
